entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 then light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
